title: So you won't get aids (Captioned)
brief_description: This teaching aid, aimed at Intellectually Disabled people, instructs about AIDS and sexually transmitted diseases, focusing on prevention. Some scenes are sexually explicit. This title should be used in conjunction with a teaching environment. Includes supertext.
